title: E field of distribution - conductor inside and out

content.prompt:
A solid metal conducting sphere has a nonzero net charge and is in electrostatic equilibrium. Which of the following describes the electric field magnitude both inside and outside the sphere?

InsideOutside
AZero everywhereDecreasing as distance from the sphere increases, reaching zero a long distance away
BZero everywhereDecreasing as distance from the sphere increases, but never reaching zero
CDecreasing as distance from the center increases, approaching infinity at the centerDecreasing as distance from the sphere increases, reaching zero a long distance away
DDecreasing as distance from the center increases, approaching infinity at the centerDecreasing as distance from the sphere increases, but never reaching zero

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
